repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Seyfarth Shaw Collection of Union Documents
did.abstract: This collection consists mostly of labor union constitutions, by-laws, labor organization Information reports (OLMS form LM-1), and labor organization annual reports (OLMS form LM-2). A few of the constitutions and by-laws are original documents, but most items in the collection are photocopies. Most strongly represented in the collection are the Teamsters and the International Typographical Union. The geographic focus of the collection is the Upper Midwest, center in the Chicago, IL area.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists mostly of labor union constitutions, by-laws, labor organization Information reports (OLMS form LM-1), and labor organization annual reports (OLMS form LM-2). A few of the constitutions and by-laws are original documents, but most items in the collection are photocopies. Most strongly represented in the collection are the Teamsters and the International Typographical Union. The geographic focus of the collection is the Upper Midwest, centered in the Chicago, IL area.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Seyfarth Shaw Collection of Union Documents #6336. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6337: Seyfarth Shaw Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements 6346 PUBS: Seyfarth Shaw Labor Publications 6350: Seyfarth Shaw Newsclipping File
